task_name: Check the status of your iPhone repair on apple.

description.thought: To check the status of an iPhone repair on Apple's website, I need to navigate to the Apple support page and likely log in with my Apple ID.  Since I don't have an accessibility tree yet, I'll start by going to the Apple support website.
description.action: Navigating to the Apple Support website (https://support.apple.com/) to begin the process of checking the iPhone repair status.
